<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Living Wildfire](/Monsters.aspx?ID=188)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Living wildfires appear as humanoids made of living fire.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/ElementalFire_LivingWildfire.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Living Wildfire](/Monsters.aspx?ID=188)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 148</row>

**Perception** +10; darkvision, smoke vision

**Languages**
[Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -2

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Smoke Vision** The living wildfire ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 80
(explosion)

**Immunities**
bleed, fire, paralyzed, poison, sleep

**Weaknesses**
cold 5

**Explosion** ([fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) When the living wild fire dies, it explodes, dealing 3d6 fire damage to each creature in a 10-foot emanation (DC 19 basic Reflex save).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tendril +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+6 fire plus 2d4 persistent fire

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fire mote +15 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d6+3 fire

</column>
